sgd
===========


```{r}
set.seed(42)
library(sgd)

data(iris)
y <- as.numeric(iris$Species == "versicolor")
X <- model.matrix(Species ~ Sepal.Length + Sepal.Width, data = iris)

coef(glm(y ~ X - 1, family = binomial))

stochastic_gradient_descent(X, y, 1e4, 0.01, 0.99, minibatch_size = nrow(X), shuffle = FALSE) ## batch
stochastic_gradient_descent(X, y, 1e4, 0.01, 0.99, minibatch_size = 10) ## minibatch
stochastic_gradient_descent(X, y, 1e4, 0.01, 0.99, minibatch_size = 1) ## stochastic
```
